title: Seeing a male husband in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Through this article, we will find evidence related to this dream to confirm this vision. Perhaps it is mostly a good vision, and our Lord is the opposite. Interpretation of seeing a husband in a dream for a single girl: When an unmarried girl sees that he is a man and is ashamed, she sees him near her house. Good news for her that she will get married. The imminent and happiness that will come from that marriage, and God knows best. When an unmarried woman sees an unknown man in a dream, his private parts appear and she feels ashamed of this scene. They made it clear that she will succeed without misery, God willing. If an unmarried girl gets engaged and dreams that her fiancé has shown her His penis. A sign of a very close relationship, as it indicates marriage soon, God willing. As for seeing a famous man showing his nakedness in a single woman’s dream, it may be a sign that this man helps her when she is in trouble, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy. A man’s penis for a man. Interpretation of seeing a husband’s penis in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a man’s penis in a dream and she is happy with this scene. Indications that she is facing problems with her husband and that they will leave quickly, and God knows best. The appearance of her husband’s penis in a dream for a married woman. A sign of happiness that always fills their lives, and they They are very close to each other. When she is surprised in a dream to see the appearance of a man’s penis. This dream indicates that God Almighty will comfort her until her worries go away and her problems end. Seeing a married woman holding her husband’s penis in a dream and feeling happy. This dream symbolizes her love for her husband and that it is one of her qualities towards Honesty and loyalty. If she is bothered by the size of her husband’s penis, it is small. It is a sign of the problems she faces, which makes her sad. If a woman is afraid of her husband’s penis in a dream because it appears large in size, this indicates goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a husband in a dream About the man and its meaning When a man sees himself happy in a dream holding his own penis, this indicates the abundant goodness that will come to him, God willing. When he saw the penis cut off, he felt sad in the dream. This indicates that he is exposed to severe crises and tribulations and he commits himself to supplication. Discomfort appears in the dream when he holds A man with a small penis is unacceptable. Because it indicates an upcoming catastrophe, God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a man reveals his nakedness in front of someone he did not know before, this is a sign of the problems he faces because of his job. Read also: Seeing a man in a dream for a married woman. Meaning of seeing a husband in a dream Pregnant woman and its interpretationWhen a pregnant woman sees herself happy holding a penis in a dream, which belongs to her husband. A sign that her life will be good, and she will be blessed with it. But if she sees in a dream a large penis symbolizing the gender of the fetus, then her memory of God will be higher and more enlightened. When she saw Her husband’s penis was cut off, she felt sad. This dream is not praiseworthy, indicating a coming disaster that will end soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a husband in a dream for young men and its meaning When a young man sees himself sitting next to a group of men and sees their nakedness, this indicates good things.

title: Interpretation of tearing cloth in a dream. The meaning of tearing cloth in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the clothing of a single person, for a married person, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for an engaged woman, for a married person or a single young man, whether it is colored black, white, green, blue, sewing, buying, and more by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about fabric by Ibn Sirin. If you see colored fabric in a dream, this foretells that you will live a comfortable and luxurious life. . If this cloth is new and cannot be worn, this foretells that you will be able to fulfill your desires. Cutting cloth in a dream means divorce. Intercourse without a second sexual intercourse with another husband. If a girl dreams that her room is decorated with this fabric, she will soon marry a man of wealth and class above her level. Seeing fabric in a dream generally means coverage and purity. Seeing colored fabric in a dream indicates a comfortable life, a decent life, and a lot of money. Cutting cloth in a dream indicates that soon you will hear new news and something will be done. Interpretation of a white cloth in a dream: Seeing white cloth in a dream indicates the blessings of the world, happiness, joy, and peace of mind, and indicates the abundance of money and plentiful food. Whoever sees in his dream that he enters a store To sell luxurious white clothes, this indicates his ample livelihood, the ease and fairness of his social and practical affairs, and his benevolence. Forgiveness and repentance from God Almighty. Interpretation of a gift of cloth in a dream. Accepting gifts in a dream indicates a good omen and the fulfillment of the dreams and efforts of the dreamer. Whoever sees in a dream someone giving him a gift or giving him a piece of cloth, this indicates a good path towards him, optimism, food and money. Interpretation of cloth in one dream. A dream of cloth in a dream shows a girl’s cover. If a girl dreams that her room is decorated with a piece of cloth, this means that she will soon marry someone. A wealthy and high-ranking man, and whoever dreams of cutting cloth, this indicates a happy event and expansion of sustenance and abundant money. Interpretation of cloth in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is tearing a garment, this is evidence of her divorce and marriage to another bad and inappropriate person, and suffering. If the torn cloth does not cover it, this is evidence of its loss. In life and her family relationships. Interpretation of cloth in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees pink fabric in her dream, this means that she will give birth to a male child, and if she sees fabrics of silk, cotton, or wool, she will give birth easily and naturally without fatigue. Vision fabric Ibn Sirin

title: Interpretation of a dream about tomatoes by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: This is what we will learn in our article today from gptafser.com/ about seeing tomatoes in a dream for men and women. Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for one girl. One girl dreams of buying tomatoes and she is happy. Ibn Shirin interpreted this as a sign that she has many good deeds in her life and that she benefits from them. The vision also symbolizes the dreamer living on a large scale in his personal and professional life. Seeing tomatoes in a dream for an unmarried girl, and they were red and ripe. It indicates that the dreamer will soon marry a good person who will protect her and be a source of happiness and care for her, and God knows best. But if the girl An unmarried woman dreams of seeing tomatoes, and they were yellow in the dream. The dream indicates her marriage except to a man who is not suitable for her, and God knows best. The appearance of tomatoes in large quantities in a dream for an unmarried girl. To be a sign of goodness and blessing in her life in general. And if the single girl sees tomatoes, and they are in small quantities in The dream. The vision means that the dreamer is suffering from financial hardship and lack of money, and God knows best. As for seeing fresh and red tomatoes in a dream for a single girl, it is a metaphor for her good luck and success in her studies. But if an unmarried girl sees rotten or spoiled tomatoes in her dream, it means that he has committed a sin. Great, and he must repent to God Almighty. The vision also shows many problems and crises in her life, and God knows best. See also: Tomatoes in a dream are good news. Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin said that seeing tomatoes in a dream for a married woman has no positive connotations. Many. He said that a married woman sees herself in a dream eating tomatoes. This means that the dreamer has many feelings of despair and depression inside her. It may indicate that the dreamer is in dire need of money, and God knows best. But when she sees that a stranger is offering her tomatoes in a dream to eat The vision is good for her. She will earn money soon, and God knows best. As for a married woman who is delaying childbearing and sees yellow tomatoes, this is a bad vision for her. It means that the dreamer will not give birth, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is feeding another woman with red tomatoes. This indicates However, her husband is in a relationship with another woman and she must fix her life so that he does not lose her, and God knows best. Seeing rotten tomatoes in the hand of a married woman’s husband in a dream is an indication that her husband is earning his money from something forbidden, and God knows best. But when fresh tomatoes appeared and they were dark red in a dream for a woman Married. The best sign of solving problems and the beginning of relief, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing a man playing with tomatoes in a dream. An indication that he is frivolous and does not bear the slightest responsibility in his life. A man dreams of hitting another person with a tomato in a dream. It indicates disagreement. And the conflict between them, and God knows best. When a married man dreams that he is giving his wife tomatoes in a dream, it will be a good sign that he will get a good promotion at work. Read also: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq The meaning of seeing tomatoes in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation

title: Interpretation of supplication in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of supplication in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Supplication in Islam is a type of worship that brings the servant closer to his Lord, and through supplication the servant can ask God Almighty about his need, and many times a person goes through many difficulties, trials and misfortunes in which he needs to call to God. May God Almighty pass his torment, so what is the meaning of the dream? A man praying in a dream? Today and until today, different, we take into account the interpretation of supplication in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq to pray for an unmarried woman, and what is the interpretation of this dream for an unmarried woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Follow us. What is the interpretation of a single woman’s supplication in a dream to Imam Al-Sadiq? If an unmarried girl dreams that she is begging, this is one of the good dreams, as this indicates that she will obtain a lot of money, and God knows best. But if an unmarried girl dreams that her mother is praying for her, this indicates Her family’s attachment to her and their love for her. An unmarried girl’s dream that someone is calling her indicates that she will have a good man and marry her and that she will live happily and stably with him. An unmarried girl dreams that a beautiful woman is praying for her, this indicates that she has heard good news, and God knows best. If a girl dreams That a group of people are calling her, this means that she is a girl that people love. Interpretation of supplication in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: If a married woman dreams that someone is calling her, does this indicate this woman? Oh, she is loved and surrounded by many people who love her and wish her well. But if a married woman dreams that her husband is calling her, this indicates her husband’s love for her and a strong relationship with her. If a married woman dreams that her mother is praying for her, this means that all her dreams and desires will come true, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams that someone is asking her to beg, this means that she is a righteous woman who adheres to her religion and that God will grant her many good things. If a married woman dreams that someone is asking her to beg, this means that she is a righteous woman who adheres to her religion and that God will grant her many good things. If a married woman dreams that the interpretation of supplication in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Seeing supplication in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the visions of praise because it generally indicates... Goodness, happiness and joy. If a pregnant woman dreams that she hears the voice of begging, this means that she will get rid of her worries, problems and sorrows. If a pregnant woman dreams that her mother is praying for her, this means that she will get rid of what is bothering her, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she is praying for her husband And she prays out loud, this means that her husband will soon expand his livelihood. Interpretation of supplication in a dream for a divorced woman according to Imam Al-Sadiq: If a divorced woman dreams that her ex-husband is the one begging her, this means that she will get rid of worries and problems, and God knows best. If a divorced woman dreams that she is whispering to her mother In supplication, it means that she will achieve all her goals. If a divorced woman dreams that she is praying for herself, this dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to live in stability without problems. Interpretation of supplication in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: If a married man dreams that he is praying to God Almighty, then this dream indicates The owner of this dream is a religious person who adheres to the teachings of his religion and has good morals

title: I dreamed that I climbed a mountain in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I climbed a mountain in a dream. Want to know what mountain climbing entails? In the following lines we learn how I dreamed of climbing a mountain in a dream All this and more details.. I dreamed that I climbed a mountain in a dream I dreamed that I climbed a mountain in a dream. Climbing mountains can be a sign of striving to achieve goals, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself climbing a mountain, this may lead to achieving goals, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself climbing a mountain in a dream, this may be a sign of achieving goals, and God knows best. It may also indicate reaching a high position, God willing. I dreamed that I was clenching my teeth in a dream. I dreamed that I was grinding my teeth in a dream, which may lead to a conflict between family members, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself clenching her teeth in a dream, this may represent quarrels and conflicts, and God knows best. When a single girl sees clenching her teeth in a dream, this may be evidence of a conflict between the girl’s family members, and God knows best. When you see pressure on the teeth in a dream, this may be a sign of strife between family members, and God knows best. I dreamed that I caught a dove in a dream. I dreamed that I caught a dove in a dream, and it was white. As a single girl sees in a dream dogs trying to follow her, it may be a sign of trouble, and God is higher and more knowledgeableI dreamed that I brought a small amount to high school in a dreamI dreamed that I brought a small amount to high school in a dream, which may indicate some unpleasant things. title: Interpretation of a check in a dream. A check in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a check in a single woman’s dream for a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man, a single woman, either payment, a check receipt, a bank payment, a signature, a signature, or writing a bank check or coupon checks and more about Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the check in Dream: In the world of dreams, to see a written check in a dream means fulfilling, returning, or paying a debt to someone. This debt can be material or moral. If you see that you received a check in a dream from someone you know who owes you, the dream indicates that he will pay your debts, so you need to be patient. But if the person who handed you the check is an unknown person or you do not have a specific relationship with him, the vision shows that you will feel indifferent to the treatment of those around you. Finding a check in a dream means that you will be rewarded for a job you did in the past. Seeing a winning bank check in a dream means that you You will be exposed to an unfair compromise. Whoever sees that he is holding a check indicates subsidy and favoritism, this may indicate a sale or loan, as it may indicate the purchase of new clothes. If you dream that you are deceiving your friends with fake checks, this means that you will resort to a trick to promote your projects. If you receive Checks, then you will be able to cover payments and inherit money. If you dream that you are paying checks, it means despair and loss of job. Seeing a check in a dream means that the person who sees the vision will come up with good ways that will make his life easier for him, and the doors of division will open and a special share will come. The meaning comes that the one with insight will pass A period in which he will be very lucky and live profitable days. The vision expresses the end of troubles and tears and the coming time to raise morale and bring laughter to the face. Seeing a check in a dream means that a halal morsel will move to the person’s throat and will bring him abundant profit. Interpretation of a check in a dream If you dream that you deceived your friends by using... A check in a dream that was fake means that you will resort to a trick to promote your projects. If you get checks, you'll be able to cover payments and inherit cash. If you dream that you are paying checks, it means despair and loss of job. Checks and bank checks have many meanings in the dreamer's dream. Seeing the dreamer receiving a check promises obtaining benefits and money equal to the value written on this check, especially if the fortuneteller knows in his dream that the person who received the check has a sufficient balance to cover the current account. The term money and benefit does not mean the actual amount and its material value, but the intangible value . The higher the amount, the greater the benefit, expense, etc. On the contrary, when you receive a check from a person who does not have a bank balance, this vision warns of the deterioration of social and family relationships, as well as the lack of money, resources and money. Therefore, this vision serves as a warning message to the viewer to be careful in the coming period of any reckless behavior, especially In business dealings, as well as to avoid any family problems and disputes, as they can disturb the family during this period.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person for one person

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person for one person is one of the things that may confuse her a lot and ask her a lot about knowing the different interpretations of the vision and the hints and meanings it may contain, and today we will shed light on this matter and give it more attention. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person for one personThe interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person for a person It indicates the long life of that person, and in general this vision is considered a good vision, because it warns the dreamer of getting rid of a group of enemies in life, and most likely these enemies are close people who appear to be the opposite of their reality, so the vision may indicate the coming of evil, difficulties and problems, especially if The deceased is the viewer himself or the fortuneteller was very sad during the vision, by God. He knows better. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person. According to Ibn Sirin, seeing the death of a living person for a person indicates the approaching date of her marriage, if this girl is waiting for marriage or is seeking to enter into a new romantic relationship, and the vision may indicate the arrival of goodness in a year, and receiving good news. And enjoyable in the near future, this makes this girl’s heart happy. One vision of the death of a living person in a dream indicates the satisfaction of desires, as well as the response to the long-awaited prayers and supplications of God. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person for a single woman from Nabulsi. According to the interpretation of Imam Nabulsi, seeing The death of a living person for a person indicates the longevity of that person, as it can indicate the approaching end of his rulings, a change in his condition, and an achievement. Her desires and vision may be strong evidence that she will obtain a great and very valuable benefit that will be a reason to change the course of her life, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream the death of a living person, this may portend to the girl that the time to reap the fruits she is striving for is very near. So she just has to be patient and ask God Almighty to facilitate. He. She. The matter, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone you love while he is alive for single people. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a loved one during the life of single people indicates the imminent death of anxiety and the arrival of happy and good news, and the vision may indicate the approaching date of this girl’s marriage to a good and just person. Whoever makes her happy and happy with him and lives a very happy life together, and also this vision may indicate this girl’s good faith and good condition, as well as her good bed, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl does not want to get married but wants to achieve a good career and hopes to have a dominant personality And she sees that the person dear to her heart is alive and dying in a dream, this indicates an imminent fulfillment. These wishes, the dream indicates that he will rise to a very special position that will be envied by everyone around him, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of the death of a living person and crying over him for one person. The dream of the death of a living person and crying over him indicates longevity and renewal of hopes, and the vision also indicates recovery from Diseases and getting rid of the anguish, sadness and tragedy that an unmarried girl is experiencing at the present time. If a girl sees herself crying bitterly and loudly over a dead person in a dream,

preview.html: So today, in this article, we will provide you with the interpretation of seeing fire in a dream, so follow the following lines from gptafser.com/.Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a single woman. Seeing fire in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that there are many difficulties and crises that she faces in life. Her life, and God knows best. A single girl who sees a burning fire in her dream shows her helplessness and lack of control over the situation she is living in at that time. When an unmarried girl sees a fire in her dream, this is evidence of her inability to coexist with the situation she is going through. Seeing a single girl Burning in a dream indicates that she is a chaotic girl who does not value time or what suits her, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl dreams of being exposed to fire and falling ill. This indicates that she has been exposed to a lot of gossip, gossip, and lies about her rights and reputation. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream That there is a fire moving from the place where you live to another place. This is evidence of the end of some disputes and rulings that exist between them and man, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fire (fire) in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in her dream means There was a fire in the house where she lives. There are major problems and disagreements between her and her husband that may be the reason for her divorce, and God knows best. When a married woman saw a fire in her dream, she felt very afraid. This indicates her constant anxiety and fear for her children and their future, and God knows best. When a married woman sees a fire A fire in her house. This may indicate that there are some problems and disagreements between one of her family members, which may be the reason for severing the relationship between them and God knows best. If a married woman sees in her dream that there is a fire in the kitchen. This may indicate that she is exposed to a disease that is difficult to treat. And God knows best. When a married woman sees a fire in her dream being extinguished. This indicates an end to the quarrels and disagreements that existed between her and her husband, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a man and its meaning. Seeing a man in a dream indicates a dream of escaping from fire. This indicates his ability to Overcoming the problems and difficulties he faces in his life, and God knows best. Seeing a fire caused by an electrical short circuit indicates a man’s dream. He will suffer a heavy loss in his work and work, and God knows best. When you see a man in a dream a car burning, this is evidence that he has committed many sins and mistakes, and accordingly To repent for it and return to God Almighty. When a person sees a huge fire in his dream, this may indicate the presence of many calamities and misfortunes, which will cause him to lose his most beloved people, and God knows best. When a person sees a fire in a dream, but he tries to put it out with a fire extinguisher, this indicates that he Overcome the stress and fears that he is exposed to, God willing. Read also: Seeing a person burning in a dream. The meaning of seeing fire in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman burning in a dream means that she will give birth to a girl, God willing, and God knows best. But if the fire burns intensely, this may be evidence of a

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about losing a cell phone or phone in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about losing a mobile phone or a phone in a dream The mobile phone is considered one of the most important means of communication in today's era, and some have described it as the new friend of man in the vast world of technology, and seeing it in a dream can be an indication of his strong relationship with reality, but this vision has other connotations that we find and discover among contemporary psychologists and jurists, and from inheritance books as well, and what concerns us in this context is clarifying the true meaning of seeing the loss of a mobile phone or a phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about losing a mobile phone or a phone in a dream Seeing a mobile phone in a dream means the important news that the dreamer is waiting for more than burning coal and the great events that will have a great impact and importance in a person’s life and future. This vision is also an indication of the formation of many social relationships that the viewer wants to benefit from and benefit from as well, as relationships have an impact and are affected. As for the interpretation of a dream about losing a cell phone, this vision indicates the loss of the ability to communicate with others, separation between him and the outside world, wasting a lot of time and effort, and reaching the goal after it is too late. Also, seeing the loss of the phone indicates a great material loss, and a psychological defeat that puts the viewer on the sidelines, feeling that he is worthless or that he is not important to others. If he sees that his cell phone is lost while walking, this indicates the loss of the ability to reach the desired goal and faces many difficulties and obstacles that discourage his steps and prevent him from walking normally. If the phone is lost in a market or a public place, it symbolizes the disclosure of many secrets or the disclosure of many information and data related to the viewer, which may expose him to a kind of blackmail from others. If he sees that a person What he stole from him, this indicates the importance of being careful of people who claim your friendship and try to show how much they love you because they are the most hostile people to you. When you fall, he will not be devoted to you. As for seeing the mobile, this vision expresses your relationship with one of them, the emotional experience you have with the partner and reaching a wonderful stage of harmony and compatibility. In the event that the phone is lost, this is an indication that the relationship is exposed to many tensions that indicate the deterioration of the bond that unites you with the partner, so it is necessary to take the initiative and save what can be saved quickly. And get out of this stage safely. The vision may indicate the dreamer's shortcomings in the right of the one he loves, his neglect of his duties, whether in his practical or emotional life, and his laziness, which may waste many blessings and things that he did not appreciate. Seeing the loss of a cell phone is one of the visions that symbolize the loss of a loved one, or the loss of something precious that cannot be compensated, or the deterioration of your condition in a way that makes you tend to isolate yourself and avoid any relationship. You have with anyone. Losing a mobile phone in a dream by Ibn Sirin It is always necessary to clarify that we do not find an explicit explanation by Ibn Sirin about seeing a mobile phone, because

title: Interpretation of a dream about prison

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about prison in a dream, and this is what you will find in the following lines. According to Ibn Sirin, prison represents a means of punishing outlaws in the world, and its mention arouses intense fear in the hearts of individuals for fear of entering it or staying in it for a long time. time. And seeing a prison in a dream sends a strong feeling of tension in the soul and tension. What does the interpretation of a prison in a dream mean in detail, you will discover in the following article from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of a dream about a prison in a dreamInterpretation of a prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretation of seeing a prison that it may indicate an illness. It prevents a person from engaging in an activity in his life, or it may refer to the entire period of travel outside the country and being away from family and loved ones. Just as the prison may indicate the grave, because the grave is the prison of the disobedient and unbelievers, it is also in prison the grave of the evil and sinners in the world. Whoever sees himself imprisoned in a dream, let him look at his condition and the state of the prison in which he is. On the Day of Resurrection, this also indicates the length of his illness and the difficulty of his recovery, and God knows best. While whoever dreams of entering prison with some of his friends, this indicates that he is returning from his travels after an absence of years. In seeing leaving prison, it is a sign that the person is leaving his isolation and introversion and entering into... Social life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is entering prison with some members of his family, this is good news about his return from travels and meeting his family after a long absence. Whoever sees in his dream that he is entering prison of his own free will, this means that he is refraining from sins and immorality, and is seeking the face of God Almighty. He fears his torment in this world and the hereafter, and protects himself from. Being mistaken for a disreputable woman who is pursuing him. Whoever sees in his dream that he is leaving a narrow prison to go to an open place, this indicates that he has been liberated from the worries and sorrows that worried his life in the past. Also, seeing the prison doors open is good news for getting rid of sorrows and worries and the emergence of... Happiness and freedom in the life of insight. Seeing a dead person imprisoned in a dream is evidence that he has committed many sins and disobedience that will torment him in the afterlife and prevent him from entering Paradise, so the dreamer should remember the dead person with supplication and take his money. It relieves the soul from its torment, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about prison and crying: Seeing the dreamer crying in prison without making a sound is a sign that he will be relieved of his sorrows and worries soon, God willing. But if someone who cries in prison cries and screams, this is the emergence of great anguish and a great calamity in his life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about unfair entry into prison. Ibn Sirin narrated that whoever dreams that he was unjustly arrested and imprisoned while crying out his innocence because he did not commit any sin, this is evidence that the dreamer is currently under great pressure from those around him, which is causing him. A deep psychological and moral crisis. Interpretation of prison in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a prison, especially if the doors are open in a single woman’s dream, is one of the praiseworthy visions that portends her ability to move forward in life and reach her aspirations and dreams that she has always sought to achieve. And when an unmarried woman sees that she Imprisoned in a house, this is...
